To upload multiple teachers, download our template sheet and add your their first and last names, email addresses, and mobile numbers. Then add the grade, subject, and classes they'll be responsible for, which were entered previously in the portal's configuration. Please note that if you add a teacher to multiple grades or subjects, separate them in the Excel sheet with a comma.

The Username:
- Must be written in Latin characters
- Must be 1 to 50 characters long
- Must contain at least one letter
- Only dashes, underscores, and periods are allowed
- Special characters are permitted except at the beginning
- Should include the portal suffix at the end
- No spaces

To upload multiple school staff members, download our template sheet and add your members' first and last names, email address, mobile number, and role. Depending on the role, add the grade, subject, and classrooms they'll be responsible for, which were entered previously in the portal's configuration.

Please note that if you add a member to multiple roles, separate each member in the Excel sheet with a comma.
